pkgmetadata.longdescription: Processing and analysis of fluorescence nuclear track detector images // Routines to process and analyze images from Al2O3:C ,Mg-based fluorescent nuclear track detectors in Medical Physics, especially ion-beam research. This package uses public domain Java code from ImageJ (Wayne Rasband, NIH, http://imagej.nih.gov/ij/), the Mosaic group (Ivo F. Sbalzarini, MPI-CBG Dresden, http://mosaic.mpi-cbg.de/) and JAMA (Joe Hicklin et al., NIST, http://math.nist.gov/javanumerics/jama/). From version 0.6.0, the package uses direct Java pointers and is not downwards compatible. For running old code, use the FNTDvintage (v0.5.99) package.
